alert.note: Alert for Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 5:21PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Flagler, south central St. Johns, northeastern Marion and Putnam Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 520 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Satsuma, or 7 miles west of Pomona Park, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palatka, Crescent City, Interlachen, Pomona Park, East Palatka, Andalusia, Fruitland, Orange Springs, Orange Mills and Bardin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns; Western Putnam
